characters: Driver of a white sedan, cyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a wide road. Initially, there is a white sedan on the right side and a cyclist in the distance. As the vehicle progresses, the white sedan suddenly cuts into the lane from the right side, causing a potential collision risk. The cyclist is also moving from left to right across the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed initially. However, due to the sudden cut-in by the white sedan from the right side, the vehicle needs to decelerate rapidly to avoid a collision. The cyclist crossing the road also requires the vehicle to be cautious.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A white sedan, approximately 1 meter away, suddenly cuts into the lane, causing a potential collision risk. 2) Left side: A cyclist, approximately 10 meters away, moving from left to right across the road.

characters: Driver of a white sedan, cyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a road with a white sedan ahead on the right side. A cyclist is seen on the left side of the road. The white sedan is moving into the lane of the observer vehicle, potentially causing a cut-in situation.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while observing the white sedan on the right side. The vehicle is preparing to decelerate due to the potential cut-in by the white sedan.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A white sedan, approximately 2 meters away, moving into the lane of the observer vehicle. 2) Left side: A cyclist, approximately 10 meters away, moving parallel to the road.
